mapper.sql: id, name, serial, machine_num, maintainer, type, status, desc, creater, modifier, modify_time, create_time

id,
name,
serial,
machine_num,
maintainer,
type,
status,
desc,
creater,
modifier,
modify_time,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update lamp_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_num = #{machineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintainer = #{maintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lamp_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_num = #{machineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintainer = #{maintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
